titleStmt.title: The defeat of the Barbary fleet; or A letter of advice relating the late glorious victory, which the Republique of Venice obtaind against the Turk in the chanel of Scio in the Archipelago, the 3d. of May 1657. Vnder the comand of the Lord Lazaro Mosenigo Captain Generall of the sea to the Republique.
titleStmt.author: N.N.M.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Lowndes at the white Lyon, near the little north door of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the white Lyon, near the little north door of Pauls
